d: Trayvon is a tie that cuts no corners for a professional result.

s.cutLoop.d: The **Loop** is a rectangular piece of fabric {{{ width }}} wide and {{{ length }}} long (this part does not use seam allowance). It is not shown because the **expand** core setting is currently disabled. Enable it to show this pattern part.

tipWidth.d: The width of your tie at the tip

knotWidth.d: The width of your tie at the knot

lengthBonus.d: How much longer than the default length to make the tie.
